decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (01-91-005; 01-91-006; 01-91-004; 01-91-001; 01-91-002; 01-91-003;01-91-009; 01-91-010; 01-91-011; 02-03-001b; 02-03-003b; 02-04-001b; 02-04-002b; 01-05-002b; 02-05-003b; Design and Access Statement; Received: 22/08/2017; 02-03-002c; 02-05-001c; Received 17/08/2017.) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Alterations to the ground and first floor windows, erection of five roof extensions, creation of an external terrace area and extended first floor balcony to the rear
